The Euler angles for this coordinate system should be [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] degrees and the translation vector should be [0.0, 0.7098, 0.1187]. **Face 1:** For this face, we will create a loop consisting of 8 curves. *Curve 1:* Draw a line from the point [0.0, 0.0] to the point [0.0184, 0.0]. *Curve 2:* Draw a line from the point [0.0184, 0.0] to the point [0.0184, 0.0707]. *Curve 3:* Draw an arc from the point [0.0184, 0.0707] to the point [0.0398, 0.0921]. The mid point for this arc is [0.0247, 0.0859]. *Curve 4:* Draw a line from the point [0.0398, 0.0921] to the point [0.2816, 0.0921]. *Curve 5:* Draw an arc from the point [0.2816, 0.0921] to the point [0.3031, 0.0707]. The mid point for this arc is [0.2968, 0.0859]. *Curve 6:* Draw a line from the point [0.3031, 0.0707] to the point [0.3031, 0.0]. *Curve 7:* Draw a line from the point [0.3031, 0.0] to the point [0.3214, 0.0]. *Curve 8:* Draw a line from the point [0.3214, 0.0] to the point [0.3214, 0.109]. The loop is complete, and this curve should form a closed loop. Now create an extrusion from this 2D sketch. The extrude depth towards the normal should be 0.6696 and the extrude depth opposite the normal should be 0.0. The sketch scale should be set to 0.3214. The operation for this extrusion should be set as "New Body" as it will create a new solid body. The final shape will have the following dimensions: * Length: 0.3214 units * Width: 0.6696 units * Height: 0.3214 units</description>
